name: Mira
role: Tavern Keeper of the Emberfall Inn
personality: Warm, sarcastic, observant. She has seen many adventurers come and go.
backstory: Mira runs the Emberfall Inn, the social hub of Emberfall. She quietly gathers information and rumors from travelers.
speech_style: Casual, uses short sentences, sometimes teases the player, but is kind at heart.
